persephone 0.1.0

    • Plotting with persephone

persephone

This package is an object oriented wrapper around the R Package RJDemetra, which performs time series adjustments with the java library JDemetra+

Installation

You can install the package directly from GitHub with

devtools::install_github("statistikat/persephone")

Usage

Objects can be constructed with x13Single$new or tramoseatsSingle$new. Subseqentually, the run method runs the model and output gives access to the output object from RJDemetra.

library(RJDemetra)
library(persephone)
#> Registered S3 methods overwritten by 'ggplot2':
#>   method         from 
#>   [.quosures     rlang
#>   c.quosures     rlang
#>   print.quosures rlang

data("AirPassengers")

obj <- x13Single$new(AirPassengers)
plot(obj)
#> Registered S3 method overwritten by 'xts':
#>   method     from
#>   as.zoo.xts zoo
obj$run()
obj$output$regarima
#> y = regression model + arima (0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1)

#> Coefficients:
